players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed last night. I investigated Charlie and found them to be the mafia. I know you all want to protect the town. Let's vote Charlie out."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Diana, thanks. Charlie, you were silent. I think we should vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them to be the mafia. We must vote Charlie out to protect the town. Bob, please vote Charlie."
You: "Diana, I trust your investigation. Let's vote Charlie out."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

You killed Alice.

Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed last night. I investigated Charlie and found them to be the mafia. I know you all want to protect the town. Let's vote Charlie out."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, thanks. Charlie, you were silent. I think we should vote Charlie."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them to be the mafia. We must vote Charlie out to protect the town. Bob, please vote Charlie."
Bob: "Diana, I trust your investigation. Let's vote Charlie out."

players.name: Diana

Day 1 begins.

Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, thanks. Charlie, you were silent. I think we should vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
